entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
